src:
Manchester United Siap Sikut Liverpool dalam Perburuan Timo Werner
04 Nov 2019, 00:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Raksasa Premier League, Manchester United dikabarkan bakal fokus untuk mengejar tanda tangan bomber RB Leipzig, Timo Werner pada jendela transfer Januari nanti.
Sinar Werner semakin terang. Bersama Leipzig, musim ini pemain 23 tahun itu sudah mencetak 13 gol dari 15 pertandingan di semua ajang. Werner juga menyumbang tiga assist.
Penampilan impresif Werner tentu mengundang tim-tim top Eropa untuk mendekatinya. Dari Inggris, Liverpool sempat diklaim menjadi klub yang paling serius menginginkan Werner.
text:
Manchester United are ready to elbow Liverpool in the hunt for Timo Werner
Nov 04 2019, 00:44 by Bola.net
Soccer - Premier League giants Manchester United will reportedly focus on pursuing the signature of RB Leipzig bomber Timo Werner in the January transfer window.
Werner's rays are getting brighter. Together with Leipzig, the 23-year-old has scored 13 goals in 15 matches in all competitions. Werner also contributed three assists.
Werner's impressive performance certainly invited top European teams to approach him. From England, Liverpool was claimed to be the club that most seriously wants Werner.
